attributes.action: allow electoral protest votes by including a none of the above box on ballot papers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that the main political parties were made to realise that they are elected to represent the feelings of the electorate.  
Voter apathy is encouraged when a significant number of the electorate feel that they have no voice because they disagree with policies furthered by the parties.
A registered protest vote would show the level of disenfranchisement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
